newsitem.title: USA: Video Lottery gets $6/shr bid from holder.
newsitem.headline: Video Lottery gets $6/shr bid from holder.

text.p: A major shareholder of Video Lottery Technologies Inc, William Spier, said on Friday he filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission his intention to form an investment group to offer to buy the company for $6 per share in cash.
Video, which provides terminals, software and services to the video lottery market, closed at 4-1/2 Friday, up 49/64.
